overview: Peng Li has led the development of Didiom’s software technology since joining the company in July 2005. He has over ten years of experience in software engineering and the development of e-commerce, wireless and database-driven platforms. Before assuming his current position, Dr. Li previously held research and development positions at China National Computer Software and Technology Service Corporation (China’s largest software provider), Pansky Technology Group (one of China’s leading providers of IT services), Citibank Singapore, Motorola Asia, CDC Corporation (NASDAQ: CHINA) and the University of Texas at Dallas. Dr. Li has also published articles on e-commerce, database optimization and security, and has presented his research to international audiences. Dr. Li holds a B.Sc. and M.Sc. in Computer Science from Renmin University in China, and a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of Texas at Dallas.
